description.lang: Product electronics and software are identical to base EU product other than use of Hong Kong Zensys module and RF configuration; only RF performance need be verified. 1 GANG BATTERY CONTROLLERFully portable, can be used from any location in the systemCan be selected as the system's Primary ControllerRF Range up to 75m (open field)Can control up to 64 devices in totalPre programmed with ALL OFF function and HOLIDAY MODE functionLow battery indicatorLong battery life of tp to 2 years (under normal operating conditions)STANDARD CARTON QUANTITY: 1Supplied with wall and back box mounting brackets, batteries and all required fixings.Operating Frequency 919.8 MHzSelect the appropriate 1 Gang Dimmer Fascia for your Battery Controller Module.
